content:
#


Few thoughts on where we've been#

I've been at this hacking shit for quite a while by now. I've had computers in
my household my entire life, but this means more than if I were to state it if I
had been born after the 90's. I vividly remember using a program / machine
called VideoPainter to create and design digital scenes, with a lot of
creativity for a program for children. I felt incredibly empowered. In the age
of AI, I feel like that's something worth reminding people. This was in 1990. I
was able to record my scenes using a blank VHS tape and capturing the screen
over a prefixed amount of time. Watching the finished tape was like attending a
kid's art show!


Where we are#

Now that I've got that out of the way, let's look at the current world we find
ourselves living in.


Where we're gonna be#

toc.text: Few thoughts on where we've been
